Articles.Content:
I make a black hole and suck yours up, then I flee to another part of the universe, and have it surrounded by black holes where you can't get in without being sucked in.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-17T15:30:50Z" title="09/17/2015 03:30  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 17, 2015</time> by legoclone09**

you are sucked in by your own black holes.

i build a new hill.

my hill.

I push you down the hill.

My hill.

I push you back down the hill.

i build a bunker on the hill.

my hill.
I cover and fill the bunker with dirt. My hill.

i exit my newly fortified bunker, shoot legoclone09 with a laser pistol, and go back in.

my hill with a bunker.
I fill the bunker with concrete, let it set, and then I stuff C4 into the cracks, then detonate it.

-1 point for not doing anything with hill.

I make new hill, clone Jebidiah 9 trillion times. The Jebs protect the hill.

My Hill.

I just sent all the clones to missions around the sun, and I swiftly take this hill with little resistance

My hill.

my nanobots swarm the hill.

my hill defended by nanobots.
I squish them. I clone my hill infinite times. Everyone else has a hill. If anyone fights I will set off my thread destroyer nuke. Everyone has a hill. and if you try to de-fuse it, it will explode.

0:05....0:04....0:03....0:02....0:01....0:00

The bomb has been defused. Counter-Terrorists win.

MVP legoclone09 for defusing the bomb.

My hill. I arm them as nano-bot mines with EMP shielding as tripmines. And I encase myself in about 600 Kerbins eith the KSC pointing away from me.

Nukes!

i build a new hill.

my hill.

I walk up and kick you off the hill

My Hill

I shoot you with RPG.

Builds new hill on Eeloo.

Automated nuke defense.

Lava vapour atmosphere. (I have a fire-proof suit)

Located in the core of Eeloo, 526 Kerbal street.

Irradiate the area breaking everything and giving you cancer.

Then, I pick up some sand, put it down and claim it. My hill!
I train all Krakens to become my bodyguards. Then, I pick up a shovel, and dig your hill into oblivion. Locating new Hill in core of Kerbol.

i place a black hole next to kerbol, then lighthugger out to another star system, where i build a hill.

my hill.
I do a cavalry charge to take the hill, sparing no survivors. My cavalry-occupied hill.
I mind-control your horses, making them eat all the grass and die. My barren hill.
I push you off the hill. Krakens now protect MY barren hill

I punch Hobbes Novakoff

my hill defended by myself.

---------------------------------------------

EDIT: Ninja'd by spaceplaneaddict!

I patch physics and the krackens shrivel up and die.

I then proceed to punch Spaceplaneaddict.

my hill defended by myself.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-22T12:34:30Z" title="09/22/2015 12:34  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 22, 2015</time> by icantmakemodels**

I devestate the hill in a fierce artillery bombardment, taking it as my own. I then move it with quantum-physics thingamabobs to the middle of the ocean and protect it with several warships, bristling with guns.

My blockaded island.

I have noclip active.

My hacky hill.

sv\_cheats 0

mp\_restartgame 1

bot\_kick

Everyone gone. My hill. And cheats off.
